youtube.title: How Life Begins: The First Day of Pregnancy Explained
youtube.description: Watch the fascinating biological process of the first day of pregnancy. This 3D animation shows fertilization, the journey through the fallopian tube, and the very first stages of embryonic development. Perfect for students and curious minds alike!
